text:
Aakash bhai,

Thanks for remembering me. We had very limited interaction in campus. Mainly because Mishra ji ke presence me hi hui, aur woh kisi ko bolne kahan dete hain. I remember you as a humble and intelligent guy. I hope we interact/collaborate more in future. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Bhai,

PHY lab me bahut ghisna pada tha Boudhayan ke chalte. Lekin uski fatti thi humari solidarity dekhke.  You are extremely chill person, true "Punjabi heart". All the Best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Achyut bhai,

Mast bakchodi karte the PE class me. Tum nahi hote toh PE me suicide vibes aati. Uske baad bhi regular interact karte rhte the. I remember you as a hardworking, dedicated and humble person. Yaad rkhna bhai ko. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Mishra Ji Namaskar,

Kaise hain aap? slack/aops pe nahi pata tha aap itne sanskari hain. Pre-JEE interaction bhi kaafi tha apna aur campus life me bhi barkarar raha. Covid ke baad bhi at least ACA events ke karan connected rahe.  Bhai America jaiye, London jaiye, Singapore jaiye aur dhoom machaiye. Kal ko US me senator ban gaye toh humara visa lagwa dijiyega (lol). All the best for your future bhai! Baat karte rahiyega.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Alan Bhai!

Cult-man of Y17 CSE. Your drams performance were really awesome. Dramatics was the only club whose performance I watched frequently (because of Varun and Nipun). You managed drams activities and department simultaneously, and it is no less than an inspiration.

Our first collaboration was obviously in TA201. Saath me kaafi bakchodi karte the :P fir bhi project kisi tarah nikal liya. But I still feel really sad ki our "Floating Ram Mandir" idea got rejected, atleast pehla Ram Mandir banta humara. Fir we frequently contacted in CS640, wrote a term paper and did a decent presentation in the limited time frame. I will always remember you as a hardworking, smart and phenomenal time-management person -- you know how to perform with limited time. I am sure you will do great in life. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Aman bhai,

One of the persons I knew even before joining IITK. You are extremely humble, hardworking guy. All the Best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Anant bhai,

Taua project yaad hai na? Bas Ram Mandir ban jaata apna. All the best for future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Ananta bhai,

Fortunate to have known you. First year me "We have come here to study" se toh tumne dhoom macha di thi. Baad me Taua me mast project banaya saath me. Ram Mandir nahi bana paye although :(. You are intelligent, dedicated and hardworking. All the best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Sharma ji _/\_

Kaafi interact kiya humne for ACA activities. Kaafi open vichar hain aapke. Chill-max, Sutta and Intelligent -- some things that come to mind while sketching your image. Day 0 pe intern (true gawd). Bhavishya me aap nayi uchaiyon tak jaayen, yahi kaamna hai. 7 July ko milenge at least har year (:P). 

Milte hain Gurgaon me ...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Anxit Das CPI 2, kick out of IIT gate.

Ye ashirvachan dimag me print ho gaye hain. Apne ML algorithm se dho dena. You are extremely dedicated and intelligent. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Hey Aniket!

Humari dosti kaafi purani hai, right from JEE days. We had an awesome time in chatroom2004 discussing interesting problems.

Uske baad we really enjoyed at IITK, shayad aur karte but niyat ko kuchh aur manzoor tha :(. You were the go to guy for me for discussing assignment problems. Kabhi kisi project par collaborate nahi kar paye, but future me zaroor karenge. 

You are truly one of the most intelligent guy I have met. In addition to that, you have a golden heart which is indeed the rarest commodity. I am sure you will keep rocking as you always did. Smalls ups-and-downs are part of life and we have seen many of them together, even before coming to campus. I am happy that we 
always recovered from it together. Iss bhai ko kabhi mat bhoolna ...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text: Anirban bhai, you are gem of a person. "Koshish karne waalon ki kabhi haar nahi hoti", you taught me this in truest sense. Saath me bulla katna, bakchodi karna, ek dusre ka mazak udana, treats, gaana, random stories, kharrata and what not. GPL me tumse zyada kutai shayad hi kisiki ki ho (arguably). Kaash kuchh time aur rehte campus me but niyat ko kuchh aur hi manzoor tha. I hope you excel in every endeavour you ever take up in life.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Ojha bhai,

Jack of all trades. Sab try kar liya btech life me?

We have known each other from class 10th. I always remember you as chill, composed, intelligent and focussed. Remove the focussed part for the new version of you (XD). Kaafi intellectual discussion hue apne beech. I am sure you'll do great in future. Bhai ko yaad rkhna. All the Best! (grammatical mistakes ho toh ignore kar dena)
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text: Aryanc403. Happy coding! bas yahi yaad hai bhai. Fb comments se entertain karte rhna. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Prof Avik,

You always inspired me with your passion, dedication and hard work. Your work speaks for itself, no words can describe it. Fortunate to have known you. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Bhai Soneria,

2nd-year tak we hardly interacted with each other. In fact, your room in C4 was also due to a tussle between our parent wings. Lekin once you joined C4, got to interact more with you. 

Kaafi chill maara saath me, including canteen, CCD, Mafia, Assignments, random chats. It would have been really good agar kuchh time aur campus me bitate. Lekin kismat ko kuchh aur hi manzoor tha. You are extremely dedicated and passionate towards CS. Always a first bencher, went to classes (although baad me humare jaisa ho gaya tha), and asked doubts. I am sure you'll do great in whichever venture you take up in future. Lets continue talking and collaborating.... All the Best
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Bhai Ayush,

We know each other from 11th but didn't talk till late class 12th. I thought you are a very "shaant" type of person, less talkative-more work, but it was as wrong as it could be. Our initial chats "Askr" were more about RETs, AITS etc. Never knew we'll spend our IIT time so close.

We enjoyed a lot in our college stay. Saath assignments karte the, class jaate the (bahut kam jaate the although), Z-sq jaate the, Domino's ka pizza khaate the, CCD jaate the etc. CFD aur ICPC bhi saath gaye the. I have spent some of my most beautiful memories of IITK with you. 

My only way to crack group assignments was simple -- get you and Umang together and then just chill. You always absorbed the technical parts and left non-technicals to us. Interestingly, humare saare collaborations turned out really well and I hope it is true in future as well.

You are intelligent, hardworking, dedicated and humble. No show-offs (except a few). I am sure you'll do great in life. Apne iss bhai ko humesha yaad rkhna ....
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Dear Bhole, 

We had a limited but continuous interaction throughout the 4 years. I think limited issliye bhi tha ki you generally talk less and work more. ECO ke assignments me kaafi collab kiya. I will remember you as a honest, hardworking, intelligent and (extremely) chill guy. I hope campus ke bahar we collaborate on projects and continue interacting. All the best for future...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Bhai Deepesh

Start wahin se karte hain jahan se silsila shuru hua tha. Khandelwal sir exam topper. IMO medalist tak ka chhakka chudaye the tum, ussi din se samajh gaye the ki thodi doori me ek khatarnak banda rehta hai. Uske baad prep ke dauran toh baat nahi hui, but Mishra ke through thoda bahut hoti thi.

First day in the wing, wing session ke baad thoda depressing type lag rha tha. Kissi ko jaante nahi the (except Shivam) aur darr ka mahaul tha. Wing intro me "Mera naam Deepesh Kumar Lall hai ..." iske baad bada achha sa laga, pata nahi kyon. Aisa laga ki yahan koi aur bhi hai jisko jaante hain. Ofc dono ek doosre ko jaante the, par kabhi baat nahi hui thi (strange but true). Fir dosti ka silsila shuru hua. First year me saath me class jaana, mess jaana, bakchodi karna, party karna, canteen jaana etc. Wing split ke baad bhi saath rehne ka saubhagya prapt hua.

2nd year me kaafi enjoy kiye the, seriously. Kitni baar CCD gaye honge, bulla sessions @infy aur games. Padhai ka discussions to secondary ho gaya. Fir intern ka struggle, but death over me chhakka lag hi gaya (lol) aur tumko sabse pehle bataye the offer ka. This year was chill + fun ...

3rd year me bhi agal bagal rhe. 5th sem was the lowest in your life. Kaafi struggles ek tackle karne pade the -- CPI kharab hui thi tumhari, but everything was momentary, you recovered and came stronger (aur fir toh phod hi diya). First PPO from our wing, first manuscript (publish nahi hua :() from our wing, aur fir toh gadar. Ab toh bas shivam ke saath ek baar firse tumhara band bajana hai, usse mast kaam kya hi hoga duniya mein. But all this is just for fun (you know better). You are an inspiration, a true brother, grounded and what not. Milte rahenge humesha. US jaake bhoolna mat.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Hey Devansh,

You were, are and forever will be the Theoretical CS gawd of Y17. Your passion for approaching problems, both theoretical and real-world is inspiring. We interacted a lot, especially in the context of ACA, where I found an entirely different version of you. I hope I also get an opportunity to collaborate with you on research in future. Keep shining, Keep innovating. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Arey Bhai,

Kya masti ki humne saath me :P. Yaad nahi kaise, but bahut pehle se hi mulakat ho gayi apni. We collaborated first time in CFD (if I am not wrong) and pulled out decent work in a limited timeframe. I think ICPC ki planning bhi tabhi ho gayi thi. Yaad hai how we deferred Amritapuri Regionals until the last date? (lol). But overall ICPC was a good experience (given the amount of work we did towards it). Fir we teamed up in Taua, wahan bhi Dubey ji ke supervision me mast kaam kiya. You are extremely dedicated and passionate, to an extent that anyone will admire you. I am sure you'll do great in future. I hope we also collaborate in future for (more fruitful) ventures. Looking towards your new novel ...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Mohan,

Dedicated-Intelligent-Hardworking-Coder. This is how I'll remember you. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Hargun bhai,

MTH gawd. Inspiring. Fortunate to meet you. You are extremely hardworking and intelligent. Keep rocking. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Harshaga bhai,

Ever-smiling, chill, dedicated and intelligent. You are one of the best people I met at IITK. We interacted a lot in offline sems. Kaafi bakchodi ki saath me - mess, canteen, random bulla.

CSE courses me bhi kaafi discuss karte the. I am sure you will do wonders in future. Fortunate to have known you. All the best for future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Bhai,

Thanks for helping us out in Taua. Teri madad kabhi nahi bhulenge. I remember you as a dedicated and hardworking person (mostly heard about you from Anirban). All the best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Jangid bhai

DoPA, IITK Bhai, Chill max pro, Jignad and GK Enthusiast. 

Bahut bakchodi ki hai hmne saath me. GPL lena (mostly tumhari hi XD), room ki maggi (yaad hai na?), poker and random bulla sessions. Parth, Srinjay ke saath General Knowledge roast me kya maza aata tha. Summer me tumhara cooler na hota toh shayad mar jaate pehle hi din.

Kisi trip par saath nahi jaa paye thoda afsos hai but shayad bhavishya me zaroor jayen. All the best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Keshav bhai,

We didn't talked much. I remember you as a humble and quiet person, so I am assuming you don't talk much in general. Your passion, hardwork and intelligence is inspirational. I hope we collaborate on some project in future. Wish you all success in life.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Krishna bhai,

IITK me aane ke saath hi tumhara chehra jaana pehchana sa laga. You are extremely humble and helpful. Canteen par aksar charchayen ho jaaya karti thi. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Bhai Shivam

Most jolly and tension-free person I have met in life. Let's revise the memories we made briefly. Thodi lambi timeline hai, bear with me. Not to mention, we grew from a child -- to a teenager -- to an adult -- to a mature responsible person together.

2013 me mile the hum log. Same section me nahi the par fir bhi sandwich khane aate the tum. Dheere dheere mitrta pragadh hui. 10th me bhi saath baithte the humlog aur bakchodi karte the. Random logon ko dhamkana (lol). Abhi bhi mailbox ke sent section me kuchh mails pade hain 2014 ke, ek map hai India ka aur kuchh jagah marked hain, shayad kisi exam ke silsile me bheje honge. Bahut masti kiye but towards the end of class 10th thoda Bodh-gyan prapt hua, ki aise toh nahi chalege. Saath me hi Khandelwal sir ke pass gaye the (biscuit incident yaad hai na?).

NTSE stage 2 prep poora saath kiye the -- books, papers, problems sab. 11th me aake things were different - school me bhi saath rehte the aur coaching me bhi. "Aap inko borbad kar dijiyega?" (yaad hai na? lol). 11th-12th ka time bahut sahi tha. Kaafi bakchodi kiye, enjoy kiye aur saath JEE diye.

Niyati ko shayad saath kuchh aur lamba karna tha, nahi toh kya hi probability hai ki do dost saath me JEE den -- same IIT mile -- same hall mile -- same wing mile -- aur aamne-samne ka room mile. Par IITK me aake confirm hua ki abhi at least 4 saal aur saath rhenge. Fir toh kya masti kiye -- belt leke room me dhamki, game (PUBG champion), CCD Party, Magai sessions aur Bulla. Mess-Canteen tk me saath jaate the. Probability ke viprit tumne intern bhi 1 floor neechel lagwa li, woh bhi Singapore me! Singapore me bhi enjoy kiye, although utna nahi.

I am sure ki future me bhi saath ventures karenge -- constantly interact karenge. I wish you all success in life. Kaash thoda perseverance aur aa jaye tumhare pass and then you will be the poster boy of JVM-IITK-success stories. Lekin humare liye toh tum "dober" hi rahoge. All the Best !
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Naman bhai,

UP waale bhaiya. You are one of the most intelligent person I have met in IITK. Abhi bhi saath me collaborate kar rhe issliye yahan likhna sirf aupcharikta hai. First year se hi constant interaction rha apna, interest match karte hain kaafi shayad issliye. I am sure you'll do great in future. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Director sahab, 

Mast bakchodi kiye first year mein. Woh camera incident yaad hai tere room pe? lol. Aise hi chaapte rhna aur yaad karna. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Nikhil bhai,

Hindi sahitya me tumhari ruchi atulniya hai. First year me "roti khaane" jaate the jhund banake. Fir interaction kam hua, par bhavishya me nishchit hi rhega. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Nipun bhai!

"Oh BKL drams waalon ne g**** m***i humari."
"Hatt bc"
"Humare Jaipur mein..."

Ye mehez lafz nahin, jazbat hain humare liye. Woh jazbat jo ab hain bhi aur nahi bhi. Thoda flashback me chalte hain.

Day 1 : Almari lock karke nikal gaye hum (:P)

Taekwando : kaafi chill marwaya tha instructor ne 

Room-Class-Chaabi-Bathroom : Aadhi samasyaon ka karan yahi combo tha!

Bloody Marry! (Bhai maza aaya tha uss din)

Mess secy elections (with me as star pracharak and manifesto writer)

CCD Parties (Loco financed)

Gin and Ginger party (purely incidental)

Mast bakchodi karna (random stories, discussions)

Tere Jaipur ke dino ko yaad karna. Tumse zyada achhe se toh hmko Jaipur ka naksha yaad ho gaya hoga. Yaad hai na Aakash Jaipur ke din (lol).

Kanpuriya traders : the thing we cooked up recently. But yahi ek constant interaction ka platform banega.

Ant mein, bas yahi kaamna hai ki Marwari dharm ka palan karo, khub paisa kamao (aur hume bhi kamwao). Kya pata ye Kanpuriya traders hi kal India ka top Hedge fund ban jaye aur tum "The Big Bull". Waise kuchh aur bhi karoge, achha hi karoge tumhari ichchha. Baaki baatein chalti rahengi, yearbook to mehez aupcharikta hai.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Bhrata Partho,

Itni memories hain ki list bhi nahi ban sakta. Fir bhi kuchh try karte hain --

"Bloody Marry" pe bed se kudna (bhai darre the tum maano ya nahi)

Kambal ke andar BKL se chat karna, aur mujhe dono ki info rehti thi üòõ

GPL agreements aur 7 RCR me bulake sabko dhona.

"Bhai Canteen chalega?" 2 ghante me endsem aur 0 prep pe bhi kabhi negative response nahi.

GTA V was lubb. Kab subah ho jaati thi bakchodi karte karte yaad bhi nahi rehta tha.

Teri namkeen Neemuch waali masha allah. Kabhi snacks ki kami nahi mehsus hoti thi. Canteen band hone ke baad bhi tere pass aate the stock ke liye.

Tere room pe late night party aur movie! Yaad hai na? Dictator movie. Aur bhi kitni movie dekhte agar ye covid na aata.

Dosa ke liye Sunday ko line lagana (lol).

Lucknow me aur bakchodi kar skte the but time constraint ne maara.

Tum toh ek saal aur ho campus me. Hopefully memories banana. Jo bhi karoge (Industry, UPSC ya research) achha karoge, bharosa hai. Best wishes for your future. Humesha yaad rkhna!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Pradeep bhai,

Bhojpuriya dabangg. Gajab time tha 1st year me. Fortunate to have met you. Zyada interact nahi kiye lekin bhavishya me zaroor karenge. All the best for future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Tera memoir likhne aaya toh do incidents hi yaad aa rhe, unhe hi likh deta hoon.

I (alongwith my group) was presenting in Neurobio class on rat psychology (or whatever it was). You were high! I mean high af!. Prof ne bola toh bhi koi asar nahi. XD

ECO assignment. Bro last-minute aake tu haath batata tha. However, you did contribute in one of the assignments quite diligently.

From the limited interaction we have had, you are an extremely chill person. Obviously, you manage other tasks well alongside the "chillness". I am sure you'll do great in the future! All the Best.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Jai Shri Ram,

Bhai mast aadmi ho tum. Humara interaction mostly Mishraji ke presence me hi rha, issliye obviously kam rha (wo auron ko bolne kahan dete). Lekin you are an extremely chill person and dedicated. I hope future me we interact and collaborate. Ab toh Ram Mandir bhi ban gaya! All the Best.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Batra sahab!

Had heard about you from the first year, but met you only in Singapore. You are extremely humble, polite, intelligent, and hard-working. I am sure you'll do great in the future. All the best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Ritesh ji,

Mishra ke presence me aapse baat bahut kam hi ho pati thi. I remember you as soft-spoken, hardworking, intelligent and infi-chill person. All the Best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Hi Sarthak,

We didn't interact much, mainly because you don't speak much. You are intelligent, hardworking and dedicated. Tower me milenge!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text: Discrete Mathematician Sayak. This is what the world knows you for. All the best! Conferences me milte rahenge.
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Yo Shobhit,

Taua me saath me kaam kiya. Fortunate to have known you. I remember you as a dedicated, intelligent and humble person. All the best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Arey Quantum Lord,

Bhool mat jaana videsh jaake. I can't imagine KD lab without you. Extremely dedicated, hardworking and intelligent. I am sure you'll do great in life. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Dear Collector Sahab

Jai Hind.

Kahan se shuru kiye the journey aur kahan aa gaye, ab toh bas naam ke collector ho tum, andar se "slave of capitalism" (lol).

Thoda flashback me chalte hain.

 2nd sem me saath me RM jaate the magne, RM101 ke saamne, 3rd floor se utarkar. Baad me kuch aur logon ko bhi location mil gaya tha but that looked like a safe haven. Fir ek din bhoot dikhi, yaad hai ? (teri g**** fa**i thi bhai, woh expression bhulaye nahi bhulta)

We enjoyed a lot together. Particularly saare course hi common lete the, saath lecture jaate the, midsem-endsem ka saath magte the, party karte the etc. Hum logon ke courses ka Hamming distance bahut kam hoga (lol). After 1st sem, 3rd was slightly low for you but fir toh jo trajectory li, aaj tak uska return mil raha hai.

# Parties in CCD + # Magai sessions + # Bulla sessions = stack_overflow

Online hone ke baad bhi we interacted almost daily. To put things concisely, we almost lived IITK life in the same lens. Itni memories hain ki enumerate nahi kar skte. But kai common interests hain humare  -- stock market, capitalism, and everything that is good for humanity (proven). In sab par charchayen hoti hi rahengi bhavishya me. You really have a vast knowledge base of General Knowledge (typical collector stuff...) but you are also analytical and logical. I am sure you will do exceedingly well in future. You are a true brother and I'll always cherish the memories. Remain humble, patient and knowledgeable throughout your life. Most probably Gurgaon me bhi saath hi rahenge, toh yearbook memoir is just a formality ...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Umang bhai,

You were always the "sankatmochan" for me. With you aside in the assignments, I never worried even a bit about the complexity of assignments. Infact, we always collaborated very well. The only hard thing was to get you to start the work (XD). But once you started the work, main bas chill maarta tha. Woh saath me assignment submit karke maggi khaane jaana was ‚ù§Ô∏è.

Debates, bakchodi and singing sessions are some of the best memories I made at IITK. Kitni baar mess me mil jaate the, subah lecture jaane waqt ya bas aise hi -- canteen me ghumte ghumte. I am sure future me we will collaborate much more and create some real value. You are jolly, playful, chill, intelligent and smart -- all ingredients for a success story. You will do wonders in life. Iss bhai ko humesha yaad rkhna ...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Varun bhai!

Thoda flashback me chalte hain.

First year me nightout maarke exams ki magai karna, we were the only bhais in same batch. BKL aur tumhari drams story was truly the best.

Second year me room bhale share kiye, but mostly single room hi lagta tha. You got too busy in drams etc. Sirf canteen/exams me milte the, lekin milte the toh mast bakchodi karte the.

Third year ka Topology yaad hai na? 1 raat magke A* laaye (lol). Playing mafia and eating together in canteen are the best memories that I'll cherish. 

You are really dedicated and intelligent. You are the living legend of one-nighter warriors. Bhavishya me bhi milte rahenge ...

Tumhara bhai
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Yo Vipul bhai,

Mast time tha in 1st year. PHY103 ka magte the saath, baaki toh humare rooms dono polar end pr the. Baad me bhi Deepesh aadhi time tumhari baat karta tha :P. You are a true entrepreneur at heart. Apni company me koi thik profile me rakh lena (:P). All the best for your future!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Yo Baheti!

It is a privelege to have known you. First-bencher, consistent, and a smart entrepreneur, this is how I will remember you. 

Your philosophy of work hard - earn hard - create assets - live like a king, is great. We only collaborated on one project till date i.e. TA202 but we had quite a lot of fun there. I am sure you'll do great in life. Looking to collaborate with you on more fruitful ventures in future ...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Yasharth bhai,

Kaafi chill, hardworking aur intelligent -- your traits as I remember. On campus interaction kaafi kam tha but online mode me kaafi interact kiye. Bhavishya me bhi karte rhenge LKO me. I am sure you'll do great in future. All the Best!
author: Abhyuday  Pandey

text:
Kothari bhai Namaskar,

You are the CS gawd of IITK Y17. Your knowledge about systems is unparalleled. Department me patta bhi tumse puchhke hilta tha. Whenever I had many things to be done at same time, I always took inspiration from you. First year me you did CFD, GSoC and extra course together. Fir 1st year me internship and 3rd year me toh 3 internships together _/\_. I never expected you'll be joining a PhD. Infact, shayad last person I would have thought. I am sure you will do phenomenally well in life! You are humble, intelligent and ambitious. I wish we collaborate on some project at least once in future ...
author: Abhyuday  Pandey
